name: Geo Elements
description:
The elements of Wind, Water, and Earth are in your favor in this game of dodging the blocks, use them wisely and try to survive as long as you can.

How to Play

-Use the "left and right arrow keys" or "A and D keys" to dodge

-Press the "space bar" to use your elements

Elements

Earth:  Gain a shield made out of rock , you are able to take 2 free hits from blocks until your shield breaks.

Wind:  Shoot a gust of wind forward knocking blocks out of your path

Water:  Shoot a block with a blast of water turning it blue, as the block lands on you it will heal instead of damage you.

Every 5 seconds your element will change.
